page.title: 16HOUSING.ANCIENT AND MODERN
page.content: A Modern House. My house is quite big.It has got a double garage.Upstairs it has got three bedrooms and a bathroom. Downstairs we have a kitchen,a hall,a lounge and a dining room.It was built by Fitchett in 1979. An Older House. My house was built in the last century.A doctor lived and worked there.It has a cellar which smells damp.Home-made beer was kept in it.There are bells for each room and you ring for a maid-my mum!The house has five bedrooms,two lounges,one dining-room,one big kitchen,two bathrooms and a big walk-in cupboard.Outside it has a big garden and some old-fashioned toilets.There are two outhouses that we use for gardening tools.
